``` {r}
#| label: skills

skill_sheet <- read_excel(path, sheet = "skills")

skill_data <- skill_sheet %>%
    separate_rows(profile, sep = ",\\s*") %>%
    filter(.data$profile == .env$profile) %>%
    group_by(short_group) %>%
    arrange(order_short, .by_group = TRUE) %>%
    ungroup()

comp <- filter_and_pull(skill_data, short_group, "core_competencies", skill) %>%
        smart_title() %>%
        paste(collapse = " · ")
stack <- filter_and_pull(skill_data, short_group, "tech_stack", skill) %>% 
        smart_title() %>%
        paste(collapse = " · ")
```

**Core Competencies**: `r comp`

**Tech Stack**: `r stack`
